channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sunken Eyes

item.title: Hello World Part 2
item.description: We successfully created a blog in our local environment in the first part of this tutorial. Now it’s time to share it with the Internet. We will levarage Github pages as our hosting environment. Why? Because it’s free! I’m gonna assume that you already have a Github account, and also install git in your local machine. You should create a new repository in your Github, give it the name personal-blog for the sake of simplicity.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: As I'm getting older it's harder for me to remember things while I realize there are more things I need to learn. Improving my memory is important. Jotting things down so that I can revise later is also a good alternative. Go is a powerful programming language, and has been my "main" programming language for a few years by the time this post is being written. I'm excited to learn Hugo, and hopefully I can create something fun with it.
